title: Class Manager
description: I found that there are many scattered, messy, and easy-to-forget class tasks, which are often ignored because different teachers announce them in different ways, such as: ordering meals, announcing homework, arranging exams......, once someone forgets, it will easily reduce the operating efficiency of the entire class. So I wanted to use a platform to give everyone different permissions and manage each other to integrate these messy class tasks.

content.title: Language
content.content: HTML, CSS, ASP.Net, Visual Basic, MSSQL

title: 創意機器人競賽
description: 我們一開始想做可以協助確診者的機器人。我們思考了一些確診者在家中可能會需要的協助,並討論如何實現這些功能、是否有可以達到相同效果卻較簡單的方試,最後確定了機器人需要的零件與架構。

title: Heatmap Generator
description: A program for converting values in excel into heatmap.
